MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the FK2 postcode area of Falkirk. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 12.05AM. Our engineers have arrived at the local substation and are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3AM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12.22AM on 31st March 2021.
